# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Hello! This _wiki_ contains resources related to the study of Ryukyu Kobujutsu (Okinawan Kobudo).

Kobudo is an armed martial art built on Karate foundations using weapons such as the bo (staff), sai (small tridents), and tonfa (baton) among others.

This book is built with Quarto and GitHub. To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.
